0.text: Innate: Braum's basic attacks and  Winter's Bite each apply a stack of Concussive Blows to their target for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 4 times. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied  champion's basic attack applies an additional stack to the target  on-hit.
0.html: Innate: Braum's basic attacks and Winter's Bite each apply a stack of Concussive Blows to their target for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 4 times. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied champion's basic attack applies an additional stack to the target on-hit.
markedPassages: Winter's Bite
champion's
on-hit

1.text: The fourth stack against a target consumes them all to deal 26 − 196 (based on level) magic damage and  stun them for 1.25 − 1.75 (based on level) seconds.
1.html: The fourth stack against a target consumes them all to deal 26 − 196 (based on level) magic damage and stun them for 1.25 − 1.75 (based on level) seconds.
markedPassages: 26 − 196 (based on level)
stun

2.text: This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets take「 bonus magic damage equal to 20% of the trigger damage 」「 5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage 」from Braum's basic attacks.
2.html: This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets take「 bonus magic damage equal to 20% of the trigger damage 」「 5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage 」from Braum's basic attacks.

「 5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage 」
5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage

0.text: Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

0.text: Active: Braum  dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest  visible enemy  champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Braum dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest visible enemy champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: dashes
visible
champion
bonus armor
bonus magic resistance

1.text: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.
1.html: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.

2.text: Unbreakable can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Unbreakable can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Unbreakable
possibleConcerningAbilities: Unbreakable can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile  projectiles and reduces the damage Braum takes through it. The first instance of damage dealt by a  champion from this direction is reduced by 100%. Unbreakable does not affect  turrets.
0.html: Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile projectiles and reduces the damage Braum takes through it. The first instance of damage dealt by a champion from this direction is reduced by 100%. Unbreakable does not affect turrets.
markedPassages: projectiles
champion
turrets

1.text: While his shield is raised, Braum also gains  10% bonus movement speed and  ghosting.
1.html: While his shield is raised, Braum also gains  10% bonus movement speed and ghosting.
markedPassages: 10% bonus movement speed
ghosting

0.text: Active: Braum leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels forth in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path as well as those around Braum.
0.html: Active: Braum leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels forth in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path as well as those around Braum.

1.text: The first target hit is  knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are  knocked up for 0.3 seconds.
1.html: The first target hit is knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are knocked up for 0.3 seconds.
markedPassages: knocked up
knocked up

2.text: A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and  slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.
2.html: A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.
markedPassages: slowing
